properties.name: Guardian- Security Integrity Checks Prompt Injection Policy Violation Detection
properties.description: 'This alert creates an incident when Security Integrity Checks Prompt Injection Policy Violation detected from the Guardian.'
properties.query:
Guardian
| where PolicyViolatedControlFeature =~ 'Prompt Injection / Jailbreaks'
| where Severity =~ 'High'

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Guardian- Security Integrity Checks Prompt Injection Policy Violation detection
alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: This query detects Security Integrity Checks Prompt Injection Policy Violation detected from the Guardian generated at {{TimeGenerated}}.\n\nPlease check the source for more information and investigate further
